-----------------------!-----------------------------------!-----------------------
			Inside the mind of manaze presents:  

iclone.bundle.2016.windows3d.simulator-manaze

  1app               2OS       3game   4boss


  -The Following content + software collection is designed for the 3D animator's who
desire unlimited possibilities and the ability to design in a 3d environment geared
toward the evolution of the way humans interact visually with VR computing. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1.-Windows 3D Operating system has been selected for this release, and is included
as a boot-able image that can be put on a USB stick or dvd and includes activation
tool so that it will never expire.  Remember to block windows 10 from windows update.
RUFUS usb bootable utility is included to make the 3D windows install process work.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
2.-Iclone Animation Software has been upgraded for the 5th year in row to such an
extent as to a level that now indicates this may be the biggest content collection
in the world, outweighing all other animation software by functionality and content.  
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
3.-A 3D War simulator has also been included in this bundle, to allow those who are both creator's and gamers to experience the ability to make their own games and easily take the aspects out of a controlled environment and enter a world of self enabled freedom to have the power to engineer almost any 3D platform desired. Over 4,000 different possibilities in conjunction with weapon systems, propulsion, defensive structures, and research technologies that are modeled around the United States Military and was an actual piece of technology that was developed for the past military. 
The Code licensing is GPL, meaning it is open source and the million's of line's
of developed code are available for manipulation @ wz2100.net forums. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
-Instructions have been included on how to get setup, hopefully this will be your
one stop shop for all of your 3D animation creating desires for years to come. 
Every aspect of the program includes media that can be utilized by most operating systems.
The version of this bundle is all Window's based, but the simulator developers have
linux and other operating system version's available online as-well. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Manaze: The movie 3D (encoded for USB SBS Glasses Left + Right Remastered 1HR47mins)
I included a copy of VLC, it will allow you to watch every video file type
